The Largest Impact Replicator

February 2010

It would be interesting to analyse which replicator has the largest impact on life and universe.

The building blocks of matter, the genes of life, the memes of culture, or the capital of prosperity.

It would be an interesting analysis to discover how they relate, what makes them living together, how they compete and collaborate, where all these will head.

Updates

Technology progress is superexponential. (link)
This story is about evolution. With focus on metasystem transition.
